page.description: Fires after data are read from Local Storage.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object that contains the following properties:

property.name: data
property.description: The data read from local storage.

discussion.p: The *[js:localStorageDecryption]* event can be used to decrypt data read from local storage. The data will be available in the *[js:e.data]* variable. If the data was encrypted in local storage, *[js:e.data]* will contain the encrypted data. JavaScript code can decrypt the data and set the e.data property to the decrypted value.
